description: Defines the database schema and constraints for the project.

rules.name: Database Type
rules.description: Use Supabase (PostgreSQL) as the primary database.

rules.name: Tables
rules.description: Tables should follow a modular design. Examples: users, projects, submissions, comments.

rules.name: Naming Conventions
rules.description: Use snake_case for table names and column names (e.g., user_profiles, created_at).

rules.name: Indexing
rules.description: Add indexes on frequently queried columns to improve performance.
